name: My Whole Family's Dead
description:
Submission for the 2023 Winter Jam by SoloDevelopment. Made in less than 72 hours with the theme "End is Near". PLEASE REPORT BUGS IF YOU FIND ANY :)

You're a little boy who just got home from school, around the same time you always do. Only this time a devastating meteor strikes your house, decimating your entire family. However, fate seems to have other plans for you as you come to realize you're reliving the same day over and over again moments before the meteor hits.

Try to convince all of your family members to leave the house by talking to them and interacting with objects around you before the time is up!

Controls:
Walk - WASD (or) Arrow Keys
Interact - E
Pickup/Drop Items - F

Credits:
Made with 001 Game Creator by Saben Studios
Art - Created by Joseph Burgus
(some art by Ty Saben)
Writing - Story written by Jacob McDonald
(Story Edited by Ty Saben)
Music - Song Created by Joseph Burgus
Sound - Sound effects created by Joseph Burgus and Jacob McDonald
(Everything else by Ty Saben)
